item.title: Go Notes
item.description: These notes have moved to https://parsiya.io/dev/go/.

item.title: Cheat Sheet
item.description: You will find those commands and tips that I need from time to time (and usually forget when I need them). This is a page to complement my clone at parsiya.io and gives me a simple repository of how-tos I can access online. Look at the table of contents below or ctrl+f and search for keywords. Tar Compress a Directory Using tar Decompress a tar.gz file OpenSSL Dump The TLS Certificate of a Domain with OpenSSL TLS Connection with a Specific Ciphersuite with OpenSSL AWS How to Use s3deploy Sync a Directory with an Amazon S3 bucket with s3cmd Change the MIME-Type of the CSS file After Upload to Fix CSS not Displaying Correctly Set the Website Index to a Non-Root file in a Static Website on S3 Use AWS CLI Without Credentials Windows Shortcut to IE (or WinINET) Proxy Settings where.
